textBeforeTable: TV Schedule Listen Live 07/12/2012 Civil lawsuits are just one part of the legal problems facing Penn State. The Louis Freeh report also suggests the university has been violating a federal statute. Freeh Report Suggests Violation Of Clery Act 07/23/2012 The sanctions against Penn State – both tough and painful – will be felt in Happy Valley for four years and beyond. Some legal observers call the NCAA’s decision misguided and misdirected. Attorney: NCAA Sanctions Should Be Challenged NewsRadio 1020 KDKA–07/24/2012 Mike Pintek talks with Pittsburgh attorney Bill Caroselli about a possible NCAA lawsuit. Was the penalty harsh enough to warrant a case? Who Are The Real Victims Of The NCAA Sanctions?
